Join two dosing regimens

Source: R/join_regimen.R
join_regimen.Rd

Join two dosing regimens

Usage

join_regimen(
  regimen1 = NULL,
  regimen2 = NULL,
  interval = NULL,
  dose_update = NULL,
  t_dose_update = NULL,
  continuous = FALSE
)

Arguments

regimen1

first regimen

regimen2

second regimen

interval

interval between regimen1 and regimen2 (if dose_update not specified)

dose_update

dose number at which to override regimen1 with regimen 2 (if interval not specified)

t_dose_update

dose time from which to update regimen

continuous

for joining continuous infusions

Value

Joined regimen

On this page
